"miss kim" was very rude towards my husband and I. talking to us as if we were an inconvenience to them. not a very good first impression.

EE6rOuckRQfBArCU_l1KpA.text: This Waffles Cafe is tasty!  It is also a fun cafe with so many lovely waffle options.  YUM!  This location is very nice.  It is bright and very open.  I have visited some of the other locations and they seem cramped, but not this one!  Lots of room to sit and relax and enjoy your waffle.  This location was also spotless!  They must have elves here to come out and clean, because it was absolutely spotless! It is also super casual, so it is a nice break from your everyday life.  The staff here is super friendly as well.  Everyone really seemed to welcome you and make you feel comfortable.  I just love great customer service and really appreciate it when I get it!  That gets Waffles a bonus star from me!  The food is yummy too.  On this visit I had the chicken & waffle.  It was really good.  It was different than I have ever had it before, so that was fun.  The waffles here are the size of the plate they come on and are of the thinner variety.  The waffle batter has something special in it, but I can't quite figure it out.  I think it is vanilla and maybe cinnamon?  I'm not sure, but they are yummy.  The chicken of the dish was 3 chicken fingers.  They tasted good, but weren't anything special.  What made the dish different was that it came with strawberry butter and a spicy hot sauce to go with the food.  The sweet, fruity butter went great with the food and I would order that on any waffle any time!  The spicy, thick, hot sauce was an interesting flavor and actually went well with the sweetness of the butter.  I know it sounds strange, but it really worked.   If you are into dessert style waffles, this is your place as well.  The have all sorts of options like apple pie filling, chocolate, pumpkin, strawberry, and a lot more to satisfy your sweet tooth.  They actually have more dessert varieties than breakfast and savory dishes.  YUMMY!  If you are into fancy teas like Thai, Boba, or Fruit teas, then you are REALLY in luck since they have about 3 dozen or tea varieties to make your taste buds happy.    I think the prices are a bit high for what you get, which is why I dropped them in the score.  The entree waffles all seem about a $1-2 too high for what you actually receive.  If the prices were a bit less, I would be at Waffles a lot more for sure.

Z4XoLhyRdkEeBXAxOHRYag.text: I used to enjoy this place alot. It has been a while since I've returned. The staff and look has changed a bit since but they are still nice. The kitchen itself had more than 6 people in it, the establishment itself had 3 parties that came after us and that was it for patrons in the restaurant. We watched parties get served and finished there entire meal before we even got ours. I could totally understand if they were busy but to have that many staff In the kitchen and to have so many open tables and having patrons wait that long i can't understand. Unfortunately I will not be coming back. To add to it, we ordered take out, and on the bottom of all 3 of our to go boxes were all holes. Why do take out boxes have holes on the bottom???? My rating was at 5, now down to 1. Staff you were nice but unfortunately quality of service was just not what it used to be....

The waffle is fluffy, crispy on the outside, warm and soft on the inside The chicken was my favorite it was so tender.. My boyfriend got some red velvet pancakes with fresh kiwi and strawberries the pancakes were fluffy and delicious as well   The reason why i don't give it 5 stars is because i thought it was a little pricey and it took about 20 minutes for us to get our food.. P7cfI0YAlMveM0ALpZpjtg.text: Couldn't find a smoothie place, so I turned to ye olde Yelp. Told me I was 110ft. away from the Waffle Cafe. Well played Yelp, well played.  I walk in and the fellow behind the counter greeted me with a big smile and hearty, "Good morning."  I ordered up my strawberry smoothie and it was up very quickly. So far so good.  Now the food review. Simply, the smoothie was delicious. The big win.  Duringy brief wait, I took a look around and it's a pleasant looking place, simple in decor. Not fancy but perfect for a breakfast joint.  They also have, wait for it... waffles. They look pretty tasty. They advertise organic and gluten free foods. Also on the menu are Boba teas and spiral cut potatoes on a stick.   Reasonable pricing, quick friendly service, and a very tatsy smoothie. They have all three restaurant issues covered.  I'd really like to try their other foods, but it's a long drive for me to get up here. But I'll certianly remember them and will stop in if I'm on this side of town again.

W5lsC7KRQkOeeK9V3xqFNQ.text: Been wanting to try this place out for a while and decided to finally give it a go. Came here for breakfast with family, upon entering we were greeted with a warm welcome. We sat at the table and the server brought us menus to browse.  I was amazed by all of the different selections of waffles they offer! They even make waffle pizza!!! They also offer boba drinks and smoothies too! The dining area is fairly large and kept clean. You do have options to build your own waffle with a variety of toppings you can add on for additional prices. My mom and I both ordered breakfast combos which comes with a waffle and 2 breakfast sides and a drink. My son ordered a breakfast sandwich with waffle fries. I did find that the waffles were a little under cooked which left an unpleasant after taste of yeast. I was a little bummed because it left me not being able to finish my waffle that I had built my way :'(  Overall experience the service is great and wait time for your food is quick.  I will definitely try this restaurant again!!!

pY7d1PugNuVZdAvQi2NpSA.text: We had such an incredible experience here. This was our first experience and wow! Our entrees were absolutely delicious. The Pumpkin Delight is so delicious. 5nfFRlCkTSM_RZHZtGSoSw.text: Ordered a breakfast sandwich. They forgot to make it. Came out covered in syrup and couldn't eat it.  Others order waffles and they forgot to bring the syrup. Avoid at all costs. Tables are extremely dirty and place is run down.

rcvoR3bO4ap7j-zJPB9UCw.text: I visited Waffles Cafe while recently in town after finding this place through Yelp. I saw that the reviews were "okay" so decided to give it a chance but unfortunately, the food was really bad. There are a a variety of menu options; which I thought was a good thing but my meal left a lot to be desired. My friend and I decided to split an order of chicken and a waffle. Do NOT order this! The "chicken" was a serving of frozen chicken fingers aka not real chicken and the waffle was completely bland. Thank God for the strawberry butter they gave me to spread onto my waffle because it made it edible.   It's unfortunate that I can't rate this place higher because the atmosphere inside is truly adorable and their staff was outstanding. Everyone I came in contact with was extremely friendly and helpful and they all were wearing a smile; which was really refreshing.   I liked the idea of this place much more than I liked the actual food but for the most part, I enjoyed my experience there, thanks to the great staff. One really cool thing that I liked was the wall of names, sayings, etc...   Tip: If you ask the server to use the label maker, she'll print off your name or whatever you like for you to stick on the wall. As a tourist, I thought that was a nice touch.

photos.caption: Photo of Waffles Cafe - North Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ask the server if you can use the label maker to post your name or a phrase on the wall. Pretty cool!

The inside is cheery and I wish I could remember the servers name, she is Korean, she was a delight and made my experience that much better. FLAdGEWkh5YXxQ-rVzzwNA.text: Seriously love this place! We've been here a couple times on the weekend and have loved coming here. Everyone is so friendly and the food is good! I'm not a huge breakfast person but even I can't turn down their waffles. For me though it's the customer service. Everyone is just happy and helpful. I will keep comin here for sure!

nc16ZG85ggqjch7EYgMdug.text: I happened to be in the area with a few hours to kill while the kid took his SAT exam so thought I'd give this place a try. (Otherwise I may never would have come all the way out here from Henderson!)  I had the pumpkin waffle with Nuttella and pecans and a hot chai tea. The waffle itself was good, crispy edges and a tender inside, but not really very pumpkiny (although I haven't had their original flavor waffle so maybe there really is a difference in taste.) The pecans added just enough crunch and the Nuttella...well, how can you go wrong with Nuttella? It came with a dollop of whipped cream which was perfect since it cut the sweetness of the Nuttella. The tea was a standard hot tea bag but they were eager to refill the water with no hesitation.   On the way out I ordered a taro boba to go. The drink itself was standard but the boba was pretty mushy, like they were leftover from the day before. Too bad.   Service was great but business was slow. While I was here there were only two other people who came in to eat. The two Asian ladies working (the owner and her sister) were very sweet and personable.  I'd go again if I'm in the area but I won't be making any special trips out there.

photos.caption: Photo of Waffles Cafe - North Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Waffles Cafe - North Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pumpkin waffle with Nuttella and pecans. Yummy!

mLuMZH33PV-EjYWPFFgxZA.text: Thank you Yelp for another Yelp recommended find.  I tried this place because of Yelp and was not disappointed.  I got the Chicken and Waffles as recommended by the server.  It was delice....  Now, the space is not much in the way of ambiance. It is the typical strip mall food spot with seats, spartan look and feel and pretty clean.  But the waffle types and combinations and the bubble tea's make this spot worth a special visit.    If they upgraded their establishment and made it a bit more fun/creative/upscale, this could then be a 5 star....

9dSiBxbCr3S-Syvg-euUug.text: Came here wanting a real breakfast it fell short.  I ended up getting a tuna waffle which was lacking tuna, too much waffle and not enough meat/flavor.  The Mrs. thought it was "ok" but I don't think we would come back unless to try a dessert waffle.

OfcVd9OEc8dQ1X1Zg4KTMQ.text: The service was fast and the food was good. But when I ordered one of the women behind the counter argued with me about the menu. I kept saying ok to her over and over and she kept repeating that the menu item that read 'blazing chicken and waffle' was a sandwich. Ok, I still want that. And this went on for a few minutes and I finally just stopped talking. I still don't understand what the problem was. I just wanted to make sure they gave us the spicy chicken not plain. The drinks are what are going to get you here. Coffee is 1.79 and sodas are 2.29 and you get a 16.9 oz bottle and a cup of ice, no refills obviously. It's worth mentioning, there's something wrong with the ventilation system. After about 15 min everyone's eyes started watering and you could see the cloudiness towards the kitchen. They seem to be nice people and the food is reasonable priced, two adults and two kids (not ordering the kids menu) was $47 with the tip. I wouldn't go out of my way to come here but I wouldn't argue if someone else wanted to come here.

-9JPf_1q30rKNghdWKYgfw.text: Nice place, wide variety of waffles to choose for your belly =d

3ebK_OjoqJJhWZG1aP2Orw.text: i have always LOVE LOVE LOVED this place but what happened to the old decor?? the customized stamps from customers all over the walls?? the overall "kawaii" zen of the place?? everything here is still fabulous, has been a favorite of mine for 4 or 5 years, but they must've recently remodeled because the inside decor is completely revamped and a little boring now in my opinion. still love the place though!

p79eT_h-MKeUkNnkiWEMcQ.text: Nice place and good concept for expanding the waffles. I went with my sister and we ordered the supreme pizza waffle, BBQ chicken waffle, and Jeff's favorite which had apple n ice cream with whip cream.   The BBQ chicken was ok. The waffle was drenched in BBQ sauce. It was too much to take. The chicken was dry. There was also pineapples which I thought was strange to have on a BBQ chicken pizza. Overall it was ok.   The supreme pizza waffle was ok too. They should've put more cheese.   The Jeff's favorite was the best out of the three but it would've been better if the apples were warm rather than cold.

5m9VXSms3BEsI8PEMLsEJA.text: Great selection of food to choose from. Staff was very friendly and helpful.  Price was good, quality and quantity of food was excellent. Will go back there again. Thank you Yelp for helping me find this place.

u5w6NhITeF4WYbLjuRP_UA.text: This is a small cafe, maximum capacity of 45. With that said, staff didn't appear to be prepared to provide the best customer service. There were only a few tables of customers when we walked in. Yet we were not greeted at all, and being our first time, we weren't sure of the ordering process. There was a bell to ring for assistance. Which in my opinion, is not the best way to get the staff's attention. It's just a distraction to other customers dining, and you get awkward looks from everyone. Now for the food, ordered 2 waffle combos, original and red velvet. You pay at the time of ordering with tip option. Which we anticipated the best so we tipped 20 %. But for being a "family recipe", waffles did not fair well against other restaurants such as, IHOP. The flavor of the batter didn't stand out, nor did the texture. And toppings are just that, topped on. Chocolate chips and blueberries are not baked into the batter. Not sure if this is an option? Eggs are very runny. Note to self, always ask for scrambled hard. Thai tea with Boba does not taste like traditional.  The tea tasted like it was a Chai blend, and the Boba was not sweet at all. Blueberry syrup, seasoned potatoes are excellent! The Columbia roasted coffee is also great. Unfortunately, this was not our best choice for breakfast. There is room for improvement in the pace of their customer service, and quality of food. I lived in Louisiana many years, and quality of food and customer service/hospitality is what makes or breaks any cafe or restaurant. To their defense, they did say have a good day when we walked out.

G3AHncHMbZ4NFQ5JddsB_A.text: I'm not a waffle person so I'm trying to be fair by going with what my waffle eating family has said.  We had the banana split waffle, a caramel pumpkin pecan waffle, and some thai tea minus the bobas.  The banana split was merely ok for me.  Kids loved but what kid wouldn't?   The pumpkin pecan was quite good.  I think I would stick with the pumpkin batter than the traditional.   Their waffles are made well.  Light and crispy on the outside and soft on the inside.  The Thai tea could have been a little bit sweeter (I've had better).  I'm not one that likes to fill up on these types of food because I always feel like I'm just putting "junk" into my body.   But I think it's a nice get away from the normal "sweet tooth" or desert outting for ice cream.  We'll be back for an occasional treat but not to eat the food as a meal.  I feel like it's just A-ok but I'm putting into consideration that I'm not a big waffle eater.  So, 4 stars for being a unique treat.

kCmRcaJVDR08BVo8oxBAZw.text: I really liked this place.    I really liked the waffles and so many options. Also I DIDN'T find that this place is super wasteful with paper and so much so to deserve a one star review like user KELLYS mentioned.    This place was very good and deserved a 5 star review!

The tornado fries were hard as rock with no flavor. The fruit was not fresh like it used be. With all of this, the food was over-priced for its quality. I'm sorry to leave this review because this not the experience I'd ever expect from Waffles Cafe. Our family will not be returning.

iglYjBc-U5_slCXGiXTt_g.text: We were on the north side of town & decided to Yelp to find a breakfast spot. So glad we did! This cute little cafe is tucked in next to the Smith's. It is smaller inside, but can accommodate moderately large parties. Everything is waffle based! I ordered the breakfast sandwich, which was eggs, ham, bacon, special sauce wedged between 2 waffle halves. Super yum! Hunny ordered the chicken and waffles - if you do NOTHING else in this life, you must order chicken here. It was amazing!!!! I wanted to order just chicken to go. It was crispy & juicy. We got fingers, but they have wings too (the table next to us ordered wings and it took all my fat girl will power not to steal them!) The waffle batter is made in house, and it was good! They also have strawberry butter, a special hot sauce for the chicken & traditional maple syrup. I wish they had one on our side of town because this would become our go to spot, but until then, hunny will just have to brave the 35 minute drive to get out there! Definitely worth trying if you are near Aliante!

Their seasoned potatoes are on point & bacon is sooo good. The owners & staff are really nice & friendly. They are also very helpful. Love this place!!

62KfjNgydJgk3ux7jdIJrA.text: I got pumpkin waffle with turkey sausage and eggs, it was pretty good. I really liked the fluffy waffles with blueberries. The waffles are warm and berries were fresh. Definitely will be coming back for waffles. Also, very friendly and accommodating staff.

xhH3x88YhUO6wxADLqzwdg.text: I had the Smores waffle, fast service, great presentation, syrup was warm and ready to go. only downfall is they didn't put enough chocolate chips on the waffle so it tastes mostly marshmallowy but still amazing. my companion had the chicken and waffles he claims the chicken tenders were very good.

photos.caption: Photo of Waffles Cafe - North Las Vegas, NV, United States

zXBVIPMgon7lbvYIwTNaAQ.text: Today was my second time ordering from this place. The first time I ordered, I ordered pancakes. They delivered a waffle. I called and spoke with the owner. She was very apologetic and offered to give me a $5 credit on my next order. I thanked her and ate the waffle but was not a fan. I was craving pancakes this morning, so I decided to give this place another try. I didn't use the $5 credit. I just paid full price. I ordered pancakes. They delivered a waffle. Again. I called again and spoke to an employee. She put me on hold and told someone about the mistake. They chuckled about it and gave me an option for a $5 credit on my next order or $1 refund because of the price difference between the pancake and waffle. I took the $1 refund because I don't plan on ordering from this place again. I recommend that they do a little better at checking the accuracy of the orders before sending them out for delivery.

cGwU6Rz8dRQu6io7F3oAHg.text: Food and service was excellent! Plastic utensils and all. And yes it is just a nice quaint cafe and that's acceptable.

IV48A60Vn5Hqedb2HX16AQ.text: You can't go wrong with waffles. I had a turkey club which had waffles instead of bread and had a super sweet syrup like sauce. Which was a bit different. I kind of wish I ordered off the regular waffle menu instead. But there's always next time. Service was great. Decently priced.

SjztodBiCjfYzgXx9_R4zA.text: It was alright. Great service and all. Very nice little place. Food was good, but not out of this world either

_ddsUTSwLdee3o7WKherCA.text: The service was great, but that's about all that can be said. The boba was mushy and deteriorating in the milk tea, and the blt waffle sandwich was pretty unappetizing. My girlfriend got a sweet waffle topped with what amounted to canned fruit and whipped cream. The waffles themselves were fine, but nothing to make a special trip for.

PNMsPo-Z7Pp3kkFLKgMS5Q.text: The cashier was super friendly, everything was clean and tidy, and the atmosphere was like a small town cafe where several of the patrons knew each other and seemed to visit frequently.  My waffle was wonderful and it was a healthy snack for my son and I! We had the blueberry/ banana one without any syrup or powdered sugar and a strawberry fresh fruit smoothie to wash it all down.  We will definitely be back for more of our mommy/son excursions!!

photos.caption: Photo of Waffles Cafe - North Las Vegas, NV, United States. &#34;Mmmm bananas,&#34; my son says :)

yxl0XiwbnIexpbD7HcB-3w.text: These are the best waffles I've ever had. Super adorable and a nice and caring staff. Definitely with the visit

JFfAK1Fb3tPRC0DO4oIFcw.text: Food was decent.  Good place to get sit down and not feel rushed.  Would suggest getting more creative with waffles and make give it a twist.  But overall I would come back.

X9RefGHxWOjp7gzxTgbKbQ.text: This diamond in the ruff is JUST the place to come for a break from the norm! Great food, a plethora of combinations to choose from and there is ALWAYS a full staff of smiles and salutations upon arrival and departure! I truly feel at home here and have made it a weekend ritual!

a84KXT1DycqLU5H23zZajQ.text: Great breakfast sandwich and delicious chicken and waffles. The homemade buffalo sauce is the bees knees. Kimberly is super friendly and knowledgeable of the food. All around great experience, will definitely be back to work my way through the menu

5ZLebEafFx15oFXV7a7H5w.text: Yum would definitely go here again! I had the waffle chicken sandwich with the special buffalo sauce. So good!

IRy2c0e0O_wokHfH0uI_UA.text: Was expecting more than paper plates and plastic silverware. Waffles were dry and my kids immediately said we should have stayed home and made waffles there. The coffee was weak as well. Not a great start for our morning!

kil6jzw3gsaX6QrD5r7zeA.text: Amazing service, great food at good prices, and many healthy options! It is nice to fontina breakfast place that has gluten free options!

oSX44L8cckQ6wp8_bybdZg.text: Love, love, love this place!! They have such original ideas for waffles. So many combinations. I love taking family and friends here. Anyways have a fun breakfast. Also love the fact that they have pictures of their different waffle options that are available. This making ordering so much easier!

dD0e7IZSa-I-Sr9rZGCmtw.text: My boyfriend and I have seen these Waffles Cafes all over town so we decided to try the  one by my house. I knew from reading the reviews that we would be dining off of paper plates and using plastic silverware.   The food took awhile to come out. We had to get our own coffee and water. I ordered the chocolate waffle with strawberries and banana slices. It was just okay. It really didn't taste like a chocolate batter. The plastic silverware made it difficult to cut my waffle. My boyfriend ordered a breakfast combo that had a waffle with peanut butter and chocolate sauce with a side of eggs and bacon. Both of us agreed that the bacon tasted like it had been cooked in used oil from the Chinese restaurant next door. Disgusting. His waffle was fine, but he didn't care for the eggs.   The grossest thing was when he went to put salt and pepper on his food. He picked up the shakers and they literally stuck to his fingers, all dirty with syrup and who knows what else on the outside.    We threw our punch card that was given to us in the trash on the way out and will be making our waffles at home from now on.

mcTutZ54FjINmqnyBLrP9w.text: Mehhhh. I wish it was better. :(  The waffles were tough.   The boba tasted like it was a a powder mix.   The service was great though. Everyone seemed so friendly.

kN-kYwsiRec0IGLYDMAKhg.text: Amazing food that was ready on time and warm friendly staff,love this place I definitely recommend it to all my friends and family

_6jNsGSElgYukqZa9tRUxQ.text: Waffles waffles waffles this place is amazing if you are a waffle lover. They have every type of waffle and topping you can think of. You can create your own or try one of their favorites. I had the chicken and waffles that was fantastic. The staff was very friendly and knowledgeable about the menu. A must stop if your are in the area. Waffles!!

cAkGqfZFjIIf3ET8HAgH1g.text: Went here for the first time today. Really cool place!! VERY clean and comfortable! Kim was GREAT very helpful and friendly!! I had the spicy chicken and waffle sandwich with waffle fries. I have to say, those were the absolute best waffle fries I have ever had! They were cooked perfectly!! The sandwich was amazing! The sauce that they put on it should be bottled and sold in stores!!! And its homemade!! The best part was the prices!! Everything was between $5-$8!!!! More than affordable for great quality and perfect portions!! I will definitely be back, and take my whole family next time!! GREAT place!!!!

Y_cwYFSnxgtyNH_OiTiqqg.text: Service was good but the waffles were not good at all. No flavor whatsoever. Id say good prices had I been excited about my food. Overall, mediocre at best

CaD_jk7hlJ6FZLEGp44uHg.text: Always great food and friendly service. Love this place. Don't forget your stamp card.

5WAXCtYlDiTdK08scJ1gDQ.text: I have been back about 4 more times since this review. I think I might be addicted haha Last time I was there I tried their  breakfast sandwich and it was delicious.

y-20v3BJ2DqWhv2bLOihRA.text: This place for just a waffle shop is so quaint and and quiet you almost feel like there might be something wrong with the food lol but there wasn't. I had a waffle sandwich and well as surprising as that sounds it was very good. It had fresh avocado and bacon as well as ham and it was superb! Alright more about the place. Well,  it has a pretty decent sized menu filled with what ever waffle fantasy creation you could think of and the prices are under $10 but above 5$ for almost all plates or waffle creations! The restaurant has lots of seating as well if you felt like you need to bring your football team or large family for some waffle goodness =)

Acry7iAo3xuAJ1tQkhknbw.text: So yummy! It's not badly priced, it's good, I really can't complain. This place has always been clean. I really like supporting these local businesses too. I hope this place doesnt go away like many of the other stores that have been in this shopping center. It's never crowded (I'm usually the only one in there). I always take my sister there for an after school snack. Waffle sandwhiches=yummmm

3QgP5EK7S-AWnzo_b3xF_g.text: I love this waffle cafe. Food is great and it's always clean when I go.  The staff is very nice.

FIRQv5-Vely_NpjknjjzkQ.text: I'd love to give this cafe a higher rating because the food was decent, but seeing 50+ typos on their printed menu was a bit unsettling. If management lack this degree of attention to detail, I wonder if they are checking the expiration date on their eggs (not a good first impression). Another issue was the server brought out 2 trays for our food and placed 1 tray onto a neighboring table (where guests were sitting!!) while she served us. MAJOR NO NO! You never place a guests food on another guests table. YIKES! ~ Lastly, the price was high when considering you have to stand to place your order, eat on paper plates and use plastic utensils..oh, can clear your own table. ($30 for 3 waffle orders with no drinks)

DSjMdzaDnO28tSbQhf0DLQ.text: Eaten here a few times now and the place has yet to disappoint.   Service is extremely friendly and polite.   Food is delicious, the waffles come out just right, the bacon is crispy and the eggs are cooked to perfection.  The pricing is very reasonable.  I would recommend that you give them a try.

IW0dyK_nRpvgJsQ9yla_cg.text: I usually get the breakfast combo which comes with waffle, eggs, bacon/sausage and coffee. Not bad for $5.95. Don't forget the stamp card.

yeIDOCxfMWQyUDeHQ16Skg.text: I did come back to eat the pizza waffle, and it was only well...meh.  I guess it just wasn't what I had expected.  The waffle was really mushy and the cheese allready coagulated when it arrived at the table.  I have to give them a pass though because they are still very new and may still be perfecting their craft.  Plus the people who work here are so friendly.

AlqADSf-xzUoIZ6qKmNryw.text: My reveiw is soley of the smoothies as that is all ive tried.going w hubby n kids for breakfast tomorrow. I had the freshest...bestest smoothie ive had in a long time here. The tropical smootie closed that was nxt foor so i figured id try this place! It was freaking awesome! Cant wait for breakfast!

-R2GwFnY0V6_BptiUpwtyw.text: always high quality very tasty waffles that come fresh, hot and delicious! great friendly customer service. relaxed atmosphere for a laid back time. over all 2nd excellent experience!

3A4PLF88j_RSLw77TcUGRA.text: We ate here once. The food was okay, but nothing too exciting. There are much better places to get waffles around Vegas.

AhoNM1OMdtYpzIIZ4ATYRQ.text: Not enough food for a chipmunk...and what did come was...meh.  Breakfast of last resorts.

5Q8GaRQLS0_eZuRzSqgw6A.text: my husband and I had been wanting to eat here for quite a while thinking it was going to be amazing. This place is more of a kid friendly place to eat. I ordered a simple waffle w/ strawberries and bananas w/ a side order of a hashbrown. my husband got just a simple pancake. our total came out to $15! totally over priced. we were brought out what i ordered but my husbands never came. after 5 minutes i inquired about his & after investigating they said they didn't ring it up & said we would have to pay. I almost wanted to yell across the room to my husband not to pay because by then I had bitten into my waffle & it was def nothing special. Hard and non flavorful. the hashbrown literally was taken out of a box and dipped in grease. At the same time another customer had the same problem, ordered something & did not receive it & had to repay. the paper plate and plasticware was not the best choice & made it hard to cut up the waffle. Overpriced. Non quality food. def sticking to making our own waffles!

w3G9uxT6ehl-Ap8Kzp5a0w.text: this place is original! very clean. we stopped by for breakfast but you can get lunch, dinner and desert!! they have a great breakfast deal a waffle (fresh not frozen) eggs, bacon/sausage and coffee for a great price. can't wait to take the kiddos... las vegas is mainly big business so this fun little spot makes me feel like i am back in eagle rock california.. you must stop by this lil gem....

_A2CbfPHqjUQ1YL1XLFySg.text: Great little place.  Looks like she has WiFi.  Waffles are very good,  According to my German husband, they are just as good as those he ate in Europe.  Very friendly and good prices.
